survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Hybrid Office Layouts Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on their satisfaction and preferences regarding hybrid office layouts to optimize workplace design and productivity.

questions.question_text: How often do you work in the office under the current hybrid work model?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to simplify data collection. Ensure options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you work in the office under the current hybrid work model?

questions.question_text: Which hybrid office layout features do you find most conducive to your productivity? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to capture diverse preferences. Limit selections to 3 to prioritize top choices.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with a max selection limit of 3

script.question_text: Which hybrid office layout features do you find most conducive to your productivity? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, have you faced with the current hybrid office layout?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Useful for identifying pain points.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, have you faced with the current hybrid office layout?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of collaborative spaces in the office?
questions.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Open collaborative spaces' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure routing targets relevant respondents.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of collaborative spaces in the office?
script.routing_logic: Appears to respondents who selected 'Open collaborative spaces' in Q2

questions.question_text: What additional features or changes would improve your hybrid office experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovative suggestions. Useful for future planning.

script.question_text: What additional features or changes would improve your hybrid office experience?
